sent.orig: We should not insult them, take away their personal effects or try to exact recantations from them, but without exception should treat them sincerely and kindly.
sent.trans: 不加侮辱，不搜财物，不要自首，一律以诚恳和气的态度对待之。

sent.orig: While they have not got their aims, their anxiety is how to get them; when they have got them, their anxiety is lest they should lose them.
sent.trans: 其未得之也，患得之；既得之，患失之。

sent.orig: Ask them to be more careful. Don't let them get slack.
sent.trans: 你要他们仔细点，不要马马虎虎。

sent.orig: Don't lend books to your friends; it's difficult to recover the books from them when you want them.
sent.trans: 不要把书借给你的朋友们，因为在你需要时，很难从他们那儿把书要回来。

sent.orig: Encouraged by them, old men and women also joined them.
sent.trans: 在他们的鼓舞下，老年人和妇女也都加入了他们的行列。
